alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 2:39PM MST until March 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...In Montana, Bighorn Canyon, Southern Big Horn, and Southwestern Yellowstone. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impacted by snow and areas of poor visibility. Hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute. Young livestock may be at risk from the wet and cold conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect snow to develop late this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
